comment.text: This translation key is used to indicate that payments for plan upgrades are not refundable. It is displayed as a warning message in the UI to inform users about potential implications of upgrading their plans.

usage.context:
<Text className="text-warning" isBold fontSize="16px">
 {t("Common:Warning")}
 </Text>
 <Text>
 <Trans
 i18nKey="PaymentNonRefundable"
 ns="Payments"
 t={t}
 components={{
 1: <span style={{ fontWeight: 600 }} />,
 }}
